title: About me
body:
Why MageTech?

One of my first email addresses was randomly assigned as MagE01@****.com

Also, being a bit of sci-fi nerd I remembered the Arthur C. Clarke quote ,"Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic"...I may have been a bit full of myself in the early years.

I never developed a portfolio or Git repo because I've been too busy writing code that makes money for companies. This updated website is an effort to change that, it was built with AI. Read the next post to learn more!

title: Built with AI
body:
Am I a good developer because I am lazy? Maybe. I’ve stayed gainfully employed through a couple of recessions so that says something I guess.

But I admit I have been feeling the heat from the AI revolution. So this website is an experiment in being as vibe codey as possible. I’ve been using Junie from IntelliJ and chatGPT (Cat, I farted for you French speakers).

I’ve posted the code at a Git repo.

title: The job interview
body:
I've done a low-tech screen recording of a personal code review of the current state of the project.

This will give you an idea of my thought process and how I conduct myself in an interview.

If you are looking for someone who can calculate a Fibonacci sequence using recursive calls during a job interview without the use of StackOverflow/Google/AI, I'm not your developer.

If you are looking for an experienced, thoughtful developer who is capable of getting stuff done in short order, please say hello. :)

title: HIPAA compliant chatbot in 8 hours....sorta
body:
Here is a chatbot that I built in 8 hours using AI. It tries to be HIPAA compliant.

It uses Telegram bot for a secure channel. On my local machine, the text file is encrypted as is my hard-drive. So the spirit is there.

NestJS is the backend. It handles appending messages to an encrypted file.

It is meant as an answering service for a therapist. It is not meant to provide treatment but to provide a high-level summary of a client's messages sent to bot.

For this POC, I used an Ollama local server using llama3.2. Here's a git repo with more details: https://github.com/emaggini-1/nestjs-telegram-bot.git
